about_the_game:
ORIGIN
Hello everyone, I'm Feng, producer and game artist at Gang Studio. We are a team of 8 consisting 3 game designers and 4 programmers.
As die-hard fans of Warcraft III and StarCraft II, we all miss the way players can dive straight into a map and start a battle. Winning requires both strategies and skills. That's where the gameplay comes from.
Industrial vehicles have always been my passion. Mechanical parts like hydraulic breaker, shear, log grapple, and dusty track just pump me up. Now I can finally drive my beasts and wield these tools to battle in Mine Clash! I sincerely hope players of all ages can enjoy this game. Please do not hesitate to give us your valuable suggestions and help us grow!

INTRO
The gameplay of Gang Studio's debut work is as straightforward as its title, Mine Clash. It is a multiplayer co-op game where players drive their vehicles and scramble for mineral resources. A 6-minute long Custom Match mode is available in Early Access. We try to avoid any complicated mechanic at this stage.
The Early Access build is 100% focusing on the gameplay. We look forward to hearing from the Steam Community to see what we can do to polish the game.

Resources
◆Grab mineral resources including ores, gold ores, diamonds and more on the map.
◆Advanced Resources spawn on the map over time.
◆Go scramble for these valuables with your team!


Vehicles
◆There are 20 vehicles in the latest version to choose from.
◆Each vehicle has an exclusive weapon that can be activated by consuming power extracted from mineral resources.
◆Vehicle weapons, including Homing Missiles, Laser Cannon, Shockwave, Stealth Mines, Turrets, and so on, provide you with all sort of tactical advantages.


Custom Match
◆Now players can create or join a Custom Match.
◆You can go solo or invite your friends to brawl together in a Custom game.
◆The Host can customize the number of players for each team (6 players per team at max).


Game Time
◆One match finishes in 6 minutes.
◆Eliminate enemy vehicles to win early.
◆It takes a little while to load the map.


Mine Clash is Free-to-Play in Early Access. Hope everyone can enjoy it. We can't wait to hear your feedback and ideas!

If you have anything to share with us, please let us know on Steam Community Hub!

short_description: Blow 'em up or get blown up in Mine Clash! One match finishes in around 6 minutes. Taking over resources on the map for your team. Pinning down enemies with your vehicle firepower and teamwork strategies to win.
